title: $1259 -- Paris and London 8-Day Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1259 -- Paris and London 8-Day Vacations $1259 -- Paris and London 8-Day Vacations by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 28, 2015 at 8:00 PM Tweet 
Travelers can visit two of Europe's top cities this winter with this London-Paris combo vacation. Gate 1 Travel has a package that includes round-trip airfare, three nights each in both London and Paris, and daily continental breakfast. Also included in this price is the airfare between London and Paris, plus all airline taxes and fees. Rates for the eight-day, six-night packages start at $1,259. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City (other departure cities are available) Airfare between London and Paris Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Three nights each in both London and Paris (various hotels available) Daily breakfast 
How to get this deal: Visit Gate 1 Travel 's website. Travel at the lowest rates is valid for departures January 10, 17, 24, 31; February 7, 14, 21, 2016. Other dates are available. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
